#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define lli long long int
long long mul( long long a, long long b, long long m ) {
  long long q = (long long)((long double)a * (long double)b / (long double)m);
  long long r = a * b - q * m;
  r %= m;
  if (r < 0) r += m;
  return r;
}
int main(){
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		lli n,b,d=1;
		cin>>n>>b;
		for(lli i=1;i<=n;i++){
			d=mul(d,i,2*b);
		}
		//d=d/2;
		if(d>=b)cout<<"Odd\n";
		else cout<<"Even\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
